column5: Comfortable and relaxing 31' sailboat moored in a natural bird sanctuary marina on Clear Lake. Guest have the full use the the marina facilities including pool, showers and laundry room. The Kemah Boardwalk is just 10 minutes away, great for kids. NASA and the space center is just across the lake too. Galveston and Moody gardens is a 45 minute drive on the freeway.
